text.section: There is created within the Department of Insurance the position of early warning analyst.
The commissioner shall appoint a qualified person to serve as early warning analyst.

The early warning analyst shall detect domiciled companies and companies doing a significant amount of business in the Commonwealth that are in a hazardous or potentially hazardous financial condition.
The early warning analyst shall be part of the Financial Standards and Examination Division.
